pages.text: Mata mune no naka ni aru mono ga, bakuro sa reru no o
Hontōni omo wa, sonohi, kare-ra ni tsuite subete shitte ora reru
Osore ononoku hi (Saigonoshinpan)
osore ononoku hi to wa nani ka
Osore ononoku hi ga, nanidearu ka o anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
(Soreha) ningen ga hisan suru ga no yō ni naru hi
Mata yamayama ga, suka reta yōmō no yō ni naru (Ni~Tsudearu)
Sore de, kare no hakari ga (zenkō de) omoi mono wa
kōfuku de michitarite kurasudearou
Daga hakari no karui mono wa
naraku ga, kare no satodearou
Sore ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
(Soreha) shōnetsu (jigoku) no hi
Anata gata wa (zaisan ya musuko nado no) ōi koto o hariatte, utsutsuwonukasu
Haka ni oitate rareru made mo
Iya, yagate (shigo) anata gata wa (sono shinjitsu o) shirou
Mōichido iou ka, iya, yagate anata gata wa shirou
Iya, anata gata wa (ima ni) hakkiri shiruto yoi nodearu
Anata gata wa kanarazu goku hi o miyou
Sonotoki anata gata wa sore o meikaku ni me de miru kotodearou
Sonohi anata gata wa,(utsutsuwonukashite ita) kyōraku ni tsuite, kanarazu towa rerudearou
